report.title: Record counts by taxon group
report.description: Lists taxon groups and the number of records within them.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl WHERE cttl.taxon_list_id=#taxon_list_id#

param.name: taxon_list_id
param.description: Select the taxon list to find taxon groups for
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM taxon_lists
